item.title: The Challenge of the Church Being The Church - Challenges
item.description: Message from Waylon Bailey on October 2, 2022 Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/foundationforlifepodcast

item.title: Reductio ad Hitlerum - FT#109
item.description:
In the one hundred and ninth episode we explore the Reductio ad Hitlerum, starting with a tweet from Trump about living in Nazi Germany and several examples of Marjorie Taylor Greene comparing random things to Hitler, Nazis, brown shirts, and the Holocaust.

In Mark's British Politics Corner we look at similar behavior by Helen Morgan MP, and the Daily Mail inadvisedly weighing in, followed by comedian Tristan Ross invoking Hitler as a comparison to Keir Starmer... Feed: https://feeds.redcircle.com/b55de027-38fd-4249-97b8-ec54d6513fd4
